title: Mirror of Germany. No. 181 = Deutschland Spiegel
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Germany - Social life and customs
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Germany (West) - Politics and government
description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: First camel race in Europe organised by Cologne Racing Club; International Motor Show in Frankfurt; German federal election - Willy Brandt elected Chancellor; Goethe's play Gotz von Berlichingen presented in annual festival at the knight's castle at Jagsthausen near Heidelberg; centenary of introduction of advertising pillars by Berlin printer, Ernst Litfas; 125th anniversary of Berlin Zoological Gardens; in World Championship football, West Germany beats Scotland 3-2.
